title: Seeley Apartments Lake Ave , Edgewater Park area
posting_body: Minutes from Edgewater Park, minutes from I-71 and I-90 interchanges.

Beautiful 4 story English Tudor apartment building, lots of character, stucco walls, mantle, bookcases, hardwood floors, range, refrigerator, well maintained suites, heat and water paid, pay only electric and stove gas, laundry, storage-no charge.
Freshly painted and detailed, Closet space, clean and sanitized, Great views, different set-ups.
1 and 2 bedroom Apartments terrific for roommates.
Intercom buzzer system rings to your phone, cable, internet ready , friendly caring on-site management with 24 hour emergency response, secure building , outdoor and indoor parking, every unit A/C.
We are a Family owned and operated
since 1972 providing dedicated professional, courteous and timely service.
Four 1 bdrm  suites coming end of July, Rental ranges for 1 bdrms  $930 to $1025, 2 bdrms range from $1300 to $1450.
